c_description: Ayesha Ahmed is a passionate Bangladeshi chef with flavorful Bengali cuisine using fresh ingredients and traditional cooking techniques.

recipes.ingredients: Rice Flour, Coconut, Jaggery, Cardamom , Oil
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Mix rice flour, coconut, jaggery and cardamom. 2. Knead to make dough. 3. Make small balls and flatten. 4. Fry in oil until golden brown.

recipes.ingredients: Prawns, Coconut Milk, Onion, Garlic, Ginger
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Fry prawns until golden brown. 2. Saute onions, garlic and ginger. 3. Add coconut milk and cook for 10 minutes. 4. Add prawns and cook for another 5 minutes.

recipes.ingredients: Rice Flour, Jaggery, Coconut Milk, Cardamom, Water
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Mix rice flour, jaggery, coconut milk, cardamom and water. 2. Pour the mixture into a greased dish. 3. Steam for 30 minutes.

c_description: Rahat Rahman is an innovative and skilled chef with 15 years of experience.

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Fry onions until golden brown. 2. Add beef and cook until browned. 3. Add garlic and ginger and cook for 2-3 minutes. 4. Add spices and cook until the beef is tender.

recipes.ingredients: Minced Beef, Onion, Tomato, Green Chili, Spices
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Mix minced beef with onion, tomato, green chili, and spices. 2. Shape into small patties. 3. Fry in oil until golden brown.

recipes.ingredients: Rice Flour, Jaggery, Coconut Milk, Cardamom, Water
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Mix rice flour, jaggery, coconut milk, cardamom and water. 2. Pour the mixture into a greased dish. 3. Steam for 30 minutes.

c_description: Farhana Rahman is a passionate chef specializing in authentic Bengali cuisine.

recipes.ingredients: Basmati Rice, Chicken, Onion, Tomato, Spices
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cook rice and chicken separately. 2. Mix together with saut√©ed onions, tomatoes and spices. 3. Cook for 10 minutes.
1. Fry fish until golden brown. 2. Saute onions, garlic and ginger. 3. Add spices and cook for 5 minutes. 4. Add fish and cook for another 10 minutes.
1. Boil lentils until tender. 2. Saute onions, garlic and ginger. 3. Add spices and cook for 5 minutes. 4. Add lentils and cook for another 10 minutes.

c_description: Nazrul Islam is an experienced chef known for unique fusion recipes.

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Fry fish in mustard oil until golden brown. 2. Saute onions and tomatoes. 3. Add turmeric and cook for 2-3 minutes. 4. Add fish and simmer for 10-15 minutes.

recipes.ingredients: Prawns, Coconut Milk, Green Chili, Mustard Paste, Salt
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Mix prawns with coconut milk, green chili, mustard paste, and salt. 2. Pour the mixture into a greased dish. 3. Steam for 10-15 minutes.
1. Fry onions until golden brown. 2. Add beef and cook until browned. 3. Add ginger and garlic paste and cook for 2-3 minutes. 4. Add yogurt and cook until the beef is tender.

c_description: Rahima Begum is a creative chef with a passion for experimenting with flavors.

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Marinate mutton with yogurt and spices. 2. Fry onions until golden brown. 3. Add marinated mutton and cook until tender. 4. Layer rice and mutton in a pot and cook on low heat until the rice is done.

recipes.ingredients: Minced Beef, Onion, Tomato, Green Chili, Spices
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Mix minced beef with onion, tomato, green chili, and spices. 2. Shape into small patties. 3. Fry in oil until golden brown.
1. Mix rice flour with coconut milk, jaggery, cardamom, and water. 2. Pour the mixture into a greased dish. 3. Steam for 20-25 minutes.

c_description: Rashida Ahmed is a versatile chef known for her delicious vegetarian dishes.

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Fry onions until golden brown. 2. Add garlic and ginger and cook for 2-3 minutes. 3. Add coconut milk and simmer for 5 minutes. 4. Add prawns and cook until done.
1. Fry onions until golden brown. 2. Add chicken and cook until browned. 3. Add tomatoes and green chili and cook until the chicken is tender. 4. Add spices and cook for 2-3 minutes.
1. Fry onions until golden brown. 2. Add beef and cook until browned. 3. Add garlic and ginger and cook for 2-3 minutes. 4. Add spices and cook until the beef is tender.
